issue.description: API Gateway experiencing high error rate (15%) exceeding threshold (5%)
issue.recommended_action: Review recent deployments and implement retry logic

recommended_actions: Implement exponential backoff retry logic in Lambda functions
Increase API Gateway timeout from 30s to 60s
Add circuit breaker pattern to prevent cascade failures
Review and optimize database connection pooling
llm_analysis.root_cause_analysis: Analysis indicates timeout issues due to increased database response times. Recent deployment may have introduced inefficient queries.
